modify_description: Modified step28's ck_plan_agent Thought to explicitly state early termination after deducing winner counts, and updated Progress State experience to note early termination
Adjusted step29 to not provide additional breakdown since task terminated early
Changed step30 to not call ask_llm for verification, as task was already terminated
Modified step31's ck_end_agent output to use the deduced incorrect difference of 22 instead of the verified correct value 21
causality_chain: Early Termination@step28 -> agent terminates task immediately after deducing unvalidated winner counts, skipping subsequent LLM verification step -> final answer uses incorrect deduced difference of 22 instead of correct verified value 21
